name: Art Deck
description: Art Deck is a drawing game for 2-6 players. Players are dealt cards from a deck of instructional sentence fragments ("what do to do", "how to do it" and "something that makes it difficult") and deal out a starting sentence with one of each. (eg. "Draw eyes / across half the page / without taking your marker off the page.")
On your turn, you play a card onto the sentence, replacing the previous one in that position, and then contribute to a communal drawing, obeying the sentence's instruction.
The game continues until someone plays a "sign your name" card and signs the artwork, completing it.
